channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Safer Payments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Safer Payments

item.title: CVE-2023-27556|2023-05-12T03:15:47.214085Z -- ibm -- safer%20payments
item.description: IBM Counter Fraud Management for Safer Payments 6.1.0.00, 6.2.0.00, 6.3.0.00 through 6.3.1.03, 6.4.0.00 through 6.4.2.02 and 6.5.0.00 does not properly allocate resources without limits or throttling which could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 249190.

item.title: CVE-2023-27557|2023-04-28T01:35:26.863Z -- ibm -- safer%20payments
item.description: IBM Counter Fraud Management for Safer Payments 6.1.0.00 through 6.1.1.02, 6.2.0.00 through 6.2.2.02, 6.3.0.00 through 6.3.1.02, 6.4.0.00 through 6.4.2.01, and 6.5.0.00 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 249192.
